  • B.Sc. in Aeronautical Engineering
  • Level-6 Bachelor in Aeronautical Engineering
  • HND in Aeronautical Engineering
  • ND in Aeronautical Engineering
  • OJT: EASA part 145 MRO

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”7477″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_custom_heading text=”Department of Computer Science & Engineering” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering under NU Bangladesh
  • Diploma in Computer Technology
  • Diploma in Web Development

  • HND in Business

  • EASA part-66,(HND+EASA)
  • Pilot Training,(PPL,CPL & IR) Type

    •  Boeing-737
    •  Airbus-A320
    • ATR 42/72 etc
